comment_61: To all you who think that Eminem is some sort of musical genius, or that this is one of the greatest albums of all time, I have to explain some things to you.  Eminem makes songs that are easy to listen to, I'll agree.  But he's not a musician, and I don't think he's overly talented.  I mean, rap in general has no musical value whatsoever, as it's prettymuch all repetitive computer generated drumbeats and some simple synthesized bass.  So to call Eminem, or any rapper for that matter, a musical genius is a farce.  But since they have no musical value, their strength has to be in their lyrics and vocal talent.  To be honest, Eminem can't sing.  He more or less talks to a beat, he doesn't sing.  And his lyrics are mainly him bitching about everything, in normal prose.  Once again, no musical value.  He's not a lyricist, he just writes long satirical rants about how the world is too mean to him.  It flows extremely well, I'll give you that, but there's no deeper meaning, no metaphors, nothing.  If you guys think that this is among the best that music has to offer, I honestly pity you.  There's so much more out there, so much actual musical talent.  My sympathies are with you.
